chapter.text: Ya su~in
Eichi ni michita, kuruan ni yotte chikau
Hontoni anata wa, shito no hitori de
tadashi michi no ue ni (hitobito o michibiku monodearu)
(Koreha) iryoku narabinaku jihibukaki okata no keiji de
sosen ga imada keikoku o ukezu, sore de kidzukanaide iru min ni, anata ga keikoku suru tame no monodearu
Hontoni sono o kotoba ga, kare-ra no oku no mono ni kudatte shimatte iru nodaga, kare-ra wa shinjinai
Ware wa kare-ra ni kubikase o hame, sore ga ago ni made oyobu. Sore de kare-ra no atama wa uwamuki ni natta
Mata ware wa, kare-ra no zenmen ni shoheki o oki, mata haimen ni mo shoheki o oki, sonoue kare-ra ni oi o shita. Sore de kare-ra wa miru koto mo dekinai
Anata ga keikoku shite mo mata keikoku shinakute mo, kare-ra ni totte onajide, kare-ra wa shinjinai
Anata wa, kunkai ni shitagau mono, mata menimienai jihibukaki okata o osoreru mono dake ni, keikoku shi nasai. Sorede anata wa korera no mono ni, kan'yo to idaina hosho no kippo o tsutae nasai
Hontoni ware wa shisha o yomigaera se, mata kare-ra ga arakajime itta koto, soshite ato ni nokoshita ashiato o kiroku suru. Ware wa issai o, meiryona kiroku-bo no naka ni kazoeagete iru
Machi no nakama (no monogatari) o, rei to shite kare-ra ni shimesuga yoi. Shito-tachi ga soko ni yattekita toki no koto o

Hajime ware wa, 2-ri no shito o noko wa shitaga, kare-ra wa, 2-ri tomo uso-tsuki atsukai o sa reta. Sorede ware wa dai 3 no mono de kyoka shita. Soshite shito-tachi wa itta. `Hontoni watashi-tachi wa, anata gata no moto ni tsukawasa reta monodesu
Suru to kare-ra wa itta. `Anata gata wa watashi-tachi to onaji ningen ni sugimasen. Jihibukaki okata wa nani mo keiji o kudasare wa shimasen. Anata gata wa, uso o tsuite iru dakedesu
Kare-ra (shito) wa itta. `Watashi-tachi ga, jissai anata gata ni tsukawasa reta monodearu koto wa,-nushi ga gozonjidesu
Watashi-tachi no tsutome wa, tada anata gata ni meihaku (na arra no o meirei) o nobetsutaeru dakedesu
Kare-ra (hitobito) wa itta. `Watashi-tachi ni totte anata gata wa tashikana kyochodesu. Moshi tomenainaraba, anata gata o kanarazu ishi-uchi (no kei) ni shimashou. Hidoi me ni awasete yarimasu zo
Kare-ra (shito) wa itta. `Anata gata koso kyochodesu. Anata gata wa kunkai sa rete mo (nao so iu no)desu ka. Iya, anata gata wa muho no mindesu
Sonotoki-cho no hazure kara hitori no otoko ga hashitte kite, itta. `Minasan,(arra kara) tsukawasa reta kono hito-tachi ni shitagai nasai
Anata gata ni nani no hoshu mo motomenai kata-tachi ni shitagai nasai. Kare-ra wa (tadashiku) michibiki o ete iru
Watashi o tsukura reta kata ni tsukaenai nado, doshite dekiyou ka. Anata gata mo kare no omoto ni kisa reru nodesu

Sono yona okata o sashioite,-gai no kamigami o motome raremashou ka. Moshi jihibukaki okata ga watashi ni wazawai o kudasou to nozoma rerunaraba, kare-ra (jashin) no torinashi wa sukoshi mo yakudatazu, mata watashi o sukuu koto mo dekimasen
(So naru to shitara) akiraka ni watashi wa ayamari o okashita koto ni narimasu
Watashi wa, anata gata no (shin no) omo o shinjimasu. Dakara (hitobito yo,) watashi (no iu koto) o kiki nasai
Sonotoki kare wa,`anata wa rakuen ni ire.' To ose rareta. Soshite kare wa `waga omo no o yurushi ga atae rare, eiyo aru mono no naka ni
kuwae rareta koto o hitobito ni shitte moraetara.' To itta
Kare no ato, ware wa sono min ni taishi ten kara gunzei o tsukawashi wa shinakatta. Mata-so suru made mo nakatta
Tada hitokoe sakebu dake de, kare-ra wa kieusete shimatta
A, awarena shimo be-tachi yo. Kare-ra wa shito ga kuru tabi, chosho shite kakatta
Kare-ra wa kidzukanai no ka, jibun-tachi izen ni iku sedai no mono o ware ga horoboshi, kare-ra wa 2-do to kaeranai to iu koto o
Sorezore mina wa,(shinpan no hi) isseini ware no mae ni mesa reyou
Kare-ra e no shirushi no 1tsu to shite wa, ware ga shinda daichi o yomigaera se, kokumotsu o sore kara seisan shi, sore o kare-ra ga taberu koto ga age rareru
Mata ware wa, soko ni natsumeyashi ya budo no en o moke, sonoaida ni izumi o waki dasa seru
Kare-ra wa sono kajitsu o taberuga, soreha kare-ra no te ga tsukuridashita monode wanai. Soredemo kansha shinai no ka
Kare no eiko o tataeru. Kare wa daichi ni haeru mono, kare-ra jishin mo, mata kare-ra no shiranai mono mo, subete shiyu ni tsukura reta katadearu
Mata kare-ra e no shirushi ni wa, yoru ga aru. Ware ga sore kara hiru o doka seru to, miyo, makkura ni naru
Mata taiyo wa, kisokutadashiku unko suru. Kore mo zen'no zenchina okata no setsuridearu
Mata tsuki ni wa, tengu o furiwaketa. (Sore o kayotte) natsumeyashi no oita yohei no yo ni (hosoku natte) modotte kuru
Taiyo ga tsuki ni oitsuku koto wa narazu, yoru wa hiru to saki o arasou koto wa dekinai. Sorera wa, sorezore no kido o oyogu
Mata mansai shita fune ni, ware ga kare-ra no shison o hakonda koto mo shirushi no 1tsudearu
Mata ware wa kare-ra ga noru,(-gai no benrina) norimono o tsukutta
Ware ga hossurunaraba, kare-ra o obore saseru koto ga dekiru. So nareba, kare-ra o tasukeru mono wa naku, sukuwa re wa shinai
Tada ware no jihi ni yotte tsukanoma o kyoraku suru dakedearu
Kare-ra ni mukatte,`anata gata no mae ni aru mono, mata ushiro ni aru mono o osore nasai. So sureba anata gata wa, kanarazu jihi ni azukarerudearou.' To iwa rete mo (mimiwokasudokoroka)
nushi kara no shuju no shirushi ga shimesa rete mo, sukkari, se o mukete shimau

Mata,`arra ga anata gata ni sadzuke rareta mono o, hodokose.' To iwa reru to, fushinjin'na mono wa shinko suru mono ni iu. `Arra ga o nozominara,(o jibun de) yashinawa reru to iu mono o, doshite watashi-tachi ga yashinau koto ga arimashou ka. Anata gata wa, akiraka ni omoichigai o shite iru dakedesu
Mata, kare-ra wa iu. `Anata gata no iu koto ga shinjitsunaraba, nanji kono (shinpan) no yakusoku (ga hatasa reru no)desu ka
Daga kare-ra ga ronso shite iru ma ni, hitokoe no sakebi ga (totsuzen) kare-ra o osou dakede wanai ka
Sonotoki kare-ra wa, yuigon suru koto mo, mata kazoku no tokoro ni kaeru koto mo dekinai
Soshite rappa ga fuka reru to, kare-ra wa hakaba kara (dete),-nushi no omoto ni isoideiku

Kare-ra wa iu. `A , nasakenai. Watashi-tachi o fushido kara yobiokoshita no wa daredeshou ka. Kore wa, jihibukaki okata ga yakusoku nasa reta toride wa arimasen ka. Shito-tachi no kotoba wa shinjitsudeatta nodesu ka
Tada hitokoe narihibikeba, isseini kare-ra wa ware no mae ni meshi atsume rareru
Sonohi ni wa dare mo, sukoshi mo futona atsukai o ukezu, anata gata wa, tada jibun no okonatta koto ni taishi mukui rareru
Hontoni rakuen no nakama-tachi wa, kono Ni~Tsu, yorokobi ni 忙 Ga shi
Kare-ra wa sono haigusha-tachi to, kokage no nedoko ni yorikakaru
Soko de kare-ra wa, kajitsu ya nozomi no mono o nandemo e rareru
Jihibukaki nushi kara `heian'are.' To no o kotoba mo aru
Anata gata tsumibito-tachi yo, kyo wa hanarete hikae nasai
Adamu no shison yo, akuma ni tsukaete wa naranai to, ware wa anata gata ni meirei shinakatta ka. Kare wa anata gata no kozen no tekidearu
Anata gata wa ware ni tsukae nasai. Sore koso tadashi michidearu
Tashika ni kare (akuma) wa anata gata no daibubun o mayowa seta. Doshite anata gata wa satoranakatta no ka
Kore wa anata gata ni yakusoku sa rete ita, jigokudearu
Anata gata wa fushinjindeatta tame ni, kyo soko ni hairu nodearu
Sonohi ware wa, kare-ra no kuchiwofujiru. Suruto sono-te ga ware ni katari, kare-ra no ashi wa, sono okonatta koto o rissho suru
Ware ga nozomeba, kare-ra no ryome o mekura ni suru koto ga dekiru. Kare-ra wa (tengoku e no) michi o sakinjiyou to suruga, doshite mitosu koto ga dekiyou ka
Ware ga nozomeba, kare-ra o sono basho de katachi o kaeru koto mo dekiru. So nareba kare-ra wa, iku koto mo kaeru koto mo dekinai
Daredemo choju sa seru sai ni wa, ware wa sozo o gyaku ni modora seyou. Kare-ra wa, soredemo satoranai no ka
Ware wa kare (muhanmado) ni uta o oshienakatta. Sore wa kare ni fusawashikunai. Kore wa (arra no) kunkai mago kata nai kuruandeari
ikeru mono ni keikoku o atae, mata fushinjin'na mono ni taishite wa wa o kotoba ga kudasa reru
Ware ga tezukara kare-ra no tame ni tsukutta kachiku o kare-ra ni shoyu sa sete iru no o minai no ka
Ware wa, sore o kare-ra (no yo) ni fukusa seta. Sorede, kare-ra wa kore ni nori, soshite taberu
Mata kare-ra wa (sono soto ni mo) iroiro sore o riyo shi, mata nomimono o eru. Soredemo kare-ra wa kansha shinai no ka
Kare-ra wa, arra no soto ni jashin o erabi nantoka tasuke rareyou to suru
Sorera (jashin-tachi) wa, kare-ra o tasukeru chikara wa naku, mushiro kare-ra no kata ga jashin o mamoru tame gunbi o totonoete iru shimatsu
Anata wa kare-ra no iu koto de, kanashinde wa naranai. Hontoni ware wa, kare-ra no kakusu koto mo gen wasu koto mo shitte iru
Ningen wa kangaenai no ka. Ware wa 一精滴 Kara kare o tsukuttade wanai ka. Sorenanoni miyo, kare wa kozen to ha mukatte iru
Mata kare wa, ware ni nazoraeru mono o hikiai ni dashite, jibun no sozo o wasure, iu. `Dare ga, kuchihateta hone o ikikaera semashou ka
Itte yaru ga i. `Saisho ni o tsukuri ni natta kata ga, kare-ra o ikikaera seru. Kare wa subete no hi zobutsu o shiri tsukushite ora reru
Midori no ki kara, anata gata no tame ni hi o tsukura reta no mo karedeari, dakarakoso anata gata wa sore ni yotte moyasu
Ten to ji o sozo nasa reta kare ga, kore ni ruisuru mono o tsukuri enaidearou ka. Iya, kare wa saiko no sozo-shadeari, zenchi de ara reru
Nanika o nozoma reru to, kare ga `are.' To o meiji ni nareba, sunawachi aru
Kare ni koso subete no sho san'are. Sono o te de ban'yu o togyo nasa reru okata, anata gata wa kare no omoto ni kisa reru nodearu
